logo.name: Wine Diary Logo
logo.description: Sleek and modern logo representing the blend of technology and wine culture.

sections.title: Unleash Your Wine Experience
sections.subtitle: Track, Discover, Enjoy
sections.name: HeroSection
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to Wine Diary, your ultimate companion in exploring the world of wines. Discover, record, and share your tasting experiences with friends and experts alike. Begin your journey today and enhance every sip!

images.name: Main Banner
images.description: Hero image displaying a scenic vineyard at sunset, capturing the essence of wine exploration.

sections.title: About Wine Diary
sections.subtitle: Our Story. Your Journey.
sections.name: AboutSection
sections.label: About
sections.content: **Wine Diary** was crafted out of a love for sharing the richness of wine experiences. Whether you are a beginner or a connoisseur, our app is designed to enrich your journey, offering a seamless way to catalog your tastings, gather insights from reputable reviews, and track memorable moments shared over a bottle.

images.name: Vineyard Background
images.description: A serene background image of lush vineyards conveying growth and maturity.

sections.title: Discover Our Features
sections.subtitle: Elevate Your Wine Exploration
sections.name: ServicesSection
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
1. **Tasting Journal**: Record the intricacies of every sip—from aroma to finish.  
2. **Review Integration**: Access and include expert reviews into your diary.  
3. **Memory Tracker**: Remember whom you shared each bottle with and recount those special moments.  
4. **Explore Recommendations**: Uncover new wines based on your taste profile.

images.name: App Feature Image
images.description: Screenshots of the app's user interface showing the tracking and review screens.

sections.title: What Wine Lovers Say
sections.subtitle: Real Stories, Real Experiences
sections.name: TestimonialsSection
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
"Wine Diary has transformed my wine journey. I never lose track of a memorable bottle or the delightful company." – Alex, Wine Enthusiast  
"The review integration is a game changer. It's like having a sommelier in my pocket!" – Jamie, Casual Drinker

images.name: Customer Image
images.description: Image of a satisfied user enjoying a glass of wine in a cozy setting.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Reach Out for More Information
sections.name: ContactSection
sections.label: Contact
sections.content: Have questions or need support? Reach out to us via our customer service email or follow us on our social media platforms. We're here to enhance your experience and help you make every glass of wine memorable.

images.name: Email Icon
images.description: Simple email icon for contact section.

sections.title: Stay Connected
sections.subtitle: Follow Us on Social Media
sections.name: FooterSection
sections.label: Footer
sections.content:
Stay updated with our latest features, offers, and wine tips. Follow us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.
